scripts.build: run-s build:stage0 && run-p build:Main build:User build:Search
scripts.build:Main: cross-env NODE_ENV=production parcel build src/view/index.html -d public/ --public-url ./
scripts.build:User: cross-env NODE_ENV=production parcel build src/info/user/index.html -d public/info/user/ --public-url /info/user/
scripts.build:Search: cross-env NODE_ENV=production parcel build src/search/index.html -d public/search/ --public-url /search/
scripts.watch:Main: cross-env NODE_ENV=development parcel watch src/view/index.html -d public/ --public-url ./
scripts.watch:User: cross-env NODE_ENV=development parcel watch src/info/user/index.html -d public/info/user/ --public-url /info/user/
scripts.watch:Search: cross-env NODE_ENV=development parcel watch src/search/index.html -d public/search/ --public-url /search/
scripts.watch: run-s build:stage0 && run-p watch:Main watch:User watch:Search
